channel.title: Home on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Keith's Diary and Other Stuff

item.title: Marking Time
item.description: Just doing as many jobs as possible, but the weather is awful and since Lotti got the ok from the vet we have decided to return to Spain if possible.

item.title: April a Lost Month
item.description: Garth and Helena having left on the 17th March and arrived safely back in Canada, now face 14 days self quarantine, very disappointing to miss out on their company. This has left Flo and I not quite knowing what to do, or what the coming days will bring.
